settings.heading: Radomir Stankovic
settings.text: Innovative and deadline-driven Shopify Developer with 8+ years of experience designing and developing user-centered web development for clients.

settings.heading: Shopify Full Stack Developer at Sidekick Web Studio
settings.text:
• Theme Development & App integration. Liquid + Vanilla Js
  • Inventory management system development. Node + Express + React + MongoDB
  • Storefront development. Storefront API + React.js
  • Conversion Rate Optimization by continuous A/B testing using Google Optimize
  • Analytics, Insight, Tracking scripts setup on PDP, Cart, Checkout pages

settings.heading: Shopify Fullstack Developer at Ea Goats
settings.text:
• Shopify Plus theme development & customization based on Zeplin, Figma, XD, Invision Design
  • Custom Shopify app development using React.js, Node.js, GraphQL, MongoDB and Shopify Polaris
  • Shopify Custom Storefront development using Next.js, Shopify Storefront API, GraphQL
  • Writing Shopify Plus Scripts for line items, shipping, payments using Ruby
  • Recharge Customer Portal Development. Novum Theme Engine, Custom theme development using Vue.js, Recharge Admin Restful API

settings.heading: Frontend Developer at Ripen
settings.text:
• Develop a collaboration tool that has most of the chat features, group management, project management, streaming, etc.
  • Build and deploy highly available & secure video conferencing solutions.
  • Development, design, and implementation of the new API endpoints as high-volume single-page applications that provided team management, and good communication
    channels such as 1:1 text/video chat, internal mailing system, and keeping manageable code complexity.
  • Implement UI using React.js and modern web technologies such as shared service, and WebRTC.
  • Improve the security and performance problems relating to end-to-end encryption in the system.
